pages.text: Weight: Very Heavy$(br)Mana Cost: 0$(br)Mana Multiplier: -20%$(br)Potency Modifier: +0%$(br)Cool Down: 10 seconds$(br2)Description:$(br)A unique shape that stockpiles on the target (defaults to the caster). It can stack up to 8 orbs, and will launch all of them upon the target performing a melee attack.
